definition: to attempt suicide/to court death
to search/to look for/to seek
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
to follow the path to one's own doom (idiom)/to bring about one's own destruction

sentences.english: I don't want to dice with death by pissing off this guy.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想招惹这哥们儿，自寻死路。

sentences.english: Our receipt of the proposal was a bombshell .
sentences.chinese: 我们如接受其建议，无疑是自寻死路。

sentences.english: “Either my father or my mother would die,” he says.
sentences.chinese: “我的父亲或是母亲会去寻死”，他说。

sentences.english: Those people who want to die are suffering.
sentences.chinese: 那些寻死的人饱受折磨。

sentences.english: Not only is it social suicide, it's mean.
sentences.chinese: 这不止是在社交上自寻死路，还很卑鄙。

sentences.english: It is for an idea, a thought, that he is getting ready for death.
sentences.chinese: 正是为了一种想法，一种思想，基里洛夫决意寻死。

definition: to commit suicide
cannot figure out/to be unable to take a lighter view/to take things too hard/to be depressed/to fret over trifles
to kill oneself/suicide
to mutilate oneself/self-harm
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
to commit suicide
once the main problem is solved, all troubles are solved/death ends all one's troubles
to hang oneself
to lose one's life/to get killed
dead end/(fig.) the road to disaster
to commit suicide by biting off one's tongue
to drown oneself by jumping into the river
go to hell!/drop dead!
to jump into a well (to drown oneself, esp. of ladies in fiction)
to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
to die together in the name of love/to sacrifice oneself for love
